official_title: To provide a 4 percent pay increase for Federal employees within the Philadelphia-Wilmington-Trenton, PA-NJ-DE-MD Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area.

summary.text: Extends a four percent interim geographic pay adjustment (as provided under the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990 to General Schedule (GS) employees in certain high cost-of-living areas) to GS employees in the Philadelphia-Wilmington-Trenton Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area in Pennsylvania, Delaware, Maryland, and New Jersey.

titles.title: To provide a 4 percent pay increase for Federal employees within the Philadelphia-Wilmington-Trenton, PA-NJ-DE-MD Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area.
